ch0250_40_saida/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Do you smell something sweet in the air?
ch0250_40_saida/0101_0701_02_10:
It’s so exciting when the entire city is full of
sweet aromas... But I must train myself to
resist any temptations!
ch0250_40_saida/7101_0701_01_10:
Today, instead of my usual uniform, I’ve decided
to wear clothes that blend in with the city a
bit more.
ch0250_40_saida/7101_0701_02_10:
Do I look OK? I’m worried that I’m not wearing
them properly.
ch0250_40_saida/7102_0701_01_10:
I like to hug Vanilluxe to cool down after an
intense workout!
ch0250_40_saida/7102_0701_02_10: It feels nice because he’s so cool to the touch.
ch0250_40_saida/7103_0701_01_10: Ah, I just love the smell of baked goods...
ch0250_40_saida/7103_0701_02_10:
Ack! What am I thinking?! I’ve got to pull myself
together and resist that temptation!
ch0250_40_saida/7103_0701_03_10:
I can’t let my guard down if I want to make Galar
karate known all around the world!
ch0250_40_saida/7103_0701_04_10: I need to train my will even more!
ch0250_40_saida/7104_0701_01_10:
When I’m tired, treating myself to something sweet
is helpful...
ch0250_40_saida/7104_0701_02_10:
But it’s hard to go out and buy desserts with so
many people queued up at the shops.
ch0250_40_saida/7104_0701_03_10:
You see...it’s a bit embarrassing when people see
me buying sweets.
ch0250_40_saida/7105_0701_01_10:
Here’s a small token of my appreciation for all
that you do, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0250_40_saida/7105_0701_02_10:
It’s a nice little treat. I really like it, so I actually
was hoping to keep it a secret...
ch0250_40_saida/7105_0701_03_10:
But you’re special. Um...don’t tell anyone I said
that, OK?
ch0250_40_saida/1701_0701_01_10:
I found something that might be helpful
for training with your partner.
ch0250_40_saida/1701_0702_01_10:
I’d like to know if I’ve gotten stronger. Would you
mind having a battle with me?
ch0250_40_saida/2501_0701_01_10:
Whenever I’m out shopping for desserts, I try to
wear clothes that blend in as much as possible...
I even do that back in Galar.
ch0250_40_saida/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s kind of embarrassing for people to know that
I’m fond of sweets...
ch0250_40_saida/2501_0701_03_10:
My heart always races because I’m worried
someone will notice me!
ch0250_40_saida/2501_0702_01_10:
I’m pretty sure nobody would recognize me when
I’m wearing this.
ch0250_40_saida/2501_0702_02_10:
What do you think? If you think it’s different
from my usual look, then I think we can call
it a success!
ch0250_40_saida/2511_0701_01_10: I wonder what flavor Vanilluxe is...
ch0250_40_saida/2511_0701_02_10:
Actually, he’s the result of two Vanillish sticking
together and becoming one Pokémon.
ch0250_40_saida/2511_0701_03_10: Maybe he’s two different flavors, then...
ch0250_40_saida/2511_0702_01_10:
Gosh... The more I think about Vanilluxe, the more
I’m starting to crave something sweet!
ch0250_40_saida/2511_0702_02_10: Would you like to join me?
ch0250_40_saida/2511_0702_03_10: We can get something to share!
ch0250_40_saida/3001_0701_01_10:
A good breakfast helps keep my body healthy!
As tasty as sweets are, my training requires that
I balance them with other foods.
ch0250_40_saida/3003_0701_01_10:
Would you mind having a battle with me? I’d
like to check how my technique is progressing.
ch0250_40_saida/3005_0701_01_10:
You must be tired after all your hard work today.
Chocolate seems like an appropriate reward for
your efforts, don’t you think?
